name: VisualStudioInstallerPatcher
description: Patches version information for Visual Studio Installer projects (vdproj).
author: RedAppleGroup

inputs.name: Sourcefiles
inputs.label: Source files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the vdproj file(s). Wildcards can be used. For example, **/*.vdproj for all vdproj files in all the sub folders.

inputs.name: Version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the version to patch. Eg: $(Build.BuildNumber).
